analysis.key_quote: "Creating Schedule F in the Excepted Service is a very bad idea. If this executive order is upheld the people who fill the jobs of those removed will not be chosen on a nonpartisan basis."
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the replacement of employees based on loyalty to Trump rather than merit, which aligns with the themes of nonpartisan governance and integrity.
